column8:
This design admires Hunter Thompson, best known for his novel "Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas".

The design uses the title of a documentary made about Thompson in 1988 called Hunter S. Thompson: The Crazy Never Die,  which is a little ironic since Thompson committed suicide, aged 67 and his suicide note read: "No More Games. No More Bombs. No More Walking. No More Fun. No More Swimming. 67. That is 17 years past 50. 17 more than I needed or wanted. Boring. I am always bitchy. No Fun — for anybody. 67. You are getting Greedy. Act your old age. Relax — This won't hurt."
